#include<iostream>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t,n,i;
    string s,bc;
    cin>>t;
    char a,b;
    double cost,tax,expn=0.0,v,bp;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>s>>a>>cost>>tax>>b;
            v=cost+(tax*cost)/100.0;
            if(expn==0)
            {
                bc=s;
                expn=v;
                bp=cost;
            }
            else if(v>expn)
            {
                bc=s;
                expn=v;
                bp=cost;
            }
            else if(v==expn)
            {
                if(cost>bp)
                {
                    bc=s;
                    expn=v;
                    bp=cost;
                }
            }
        }
        cout<<bc<<'\n';
        expn=0.0;
    }
    return 0;
}
